startMessage: 🦄 Uniswap 🤖bot welcomes you!🌟 This bot will help you find out the current price of the token you are interested in on the 🦄 Uniswap cryptocurrency exchange. In order to get started, you just need to enter the tickers of your 💰tokens through a space and it will show you the price of the pair. More detailed ℹ️information can be found on touch /help command . We hope that the bot will be useful for you)
helpMessage: How to use this bot? You just need to enter the tokens 💰tickers (lower case or upper case, no matter), the price of which you would like to know and bot will give you this price. Example: AAVE BAL (You can try the example, just copy and paste) If you enter an incorrect ticker, the bot will inform you about this and you will need to enter the correct ticker. Enjoy 😉
authors: The authors of this bot are: Alexey Horbunov (@Alexey_Horbunov) GitHub: Click on this link LinkedIn: Click on this link Timofey Fedorchuk (@tim_fedor) GitHub: Click on this link LinkedIn: Click on this link
loading: Please wait, the bot is processing the request... (Usually it`s about 5 seconds)
errorFormat: ⚠️Please, enter your tokens in right format, check /help menu for more ℹ️information
errorTickers: ❌The tokens you entered are not traded on Uniswap or you entered tickers incorrectly. Check your tokens again
